title: Hot tub time machine

authors._comment: There can only be one author.

characters.name: Iloa Namie
characters.personality: Boisterous and adventurous. A little bit of a troublemaker
characters.minor_description: Blue eyes, brown hair. Pale complexity, short and slim. Likes reading and playing with her brother.
characters._comment: Everything but the name and role are optional.

characters.name: Jason Namie
characters._comment: Name and role must not be blank.

_comment: Represents the end of the line.
story_content:
'Little duck, little duck, dost thou see, 
 Hansel and Gretel are waiting for thee. 
 There's never a plank, or bridge in sight, 
 take us across on thy back so white.' 
 The duck came to them, and Hansel seated himself on its back, and told his sister to sit by him. 
 'No,' replied Gretel, 'that will be too heavy for the little duck. She shall take us across, one after the other.'
